rows.label: qev041903_MSG0001
rows.name:
Silly, sweet Nio! Worrying about dress for Popo
at time like this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041903_MSG0002
rows.name: You are hopeless, lovely idiot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041903_MSG0003
rows.name:
Materials Popo needs friend to gather are diresheep
and antorus roses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041903_MSG0004
rows.name:
Tuft hairpiece has to be dead ringer for real thing.
Only finest ingredients will do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041903_MSG0005
rows.name: Oh, Popo still need to properly thank friend...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041903_MSG0006
rows.name: ...Hmm? Friend has something for Popo?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041903_MSG0007
rows.name:
Ooooh! So blue! So sparkly!
Wait, is this...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041903_MSG0008
rows.name: It is wedding ring Nio bought![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041903_MSG0009
rows.name: Oh, this is like wonderful dream...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041903_MSG0010
rows.name:
...Hey, wait one minute! That ring was stolen!
How does friend have it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041903_JNK0010
rows.name: Evade

rows.label: qev041903_SEL0011
rows.name:
Say you can't really remember,
then try to change the subject.

rows.label: qev041903_JNK0020
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev041903_SEL0021
rows.name:
Tell Popo that you found it after
defeating a feral nopopotamus.

rows.label: qev041903_MSG0011
rows.name:
Waaaaait. Did friend maybe mistake nopopotamus of
Ntoto for wild one and kill it while Ntoto napped?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041903_MSG0012
rows.name: Because THAT would explain why friend has ring.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041903_MSG0013
rows.name:
Wait, wait. Friend mistook that nopopotamus for wild
one and killed it while Ntoto was napping?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041903_MSG0014
rows.name:
Ntoto was terrified when nap ended!
What with nopopotamus suddenly being corpse and all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041903_MSG0015
rows.name:
Then the one who caused all of this trouble in first
place is...human friend?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041903_MSG0016
rows.name:
Ugh! And all this time Nio was stressing out enough
to go bald![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041903_MSG0017
rows.name:
But ring found its way back to Nio, so it all
worked out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041903_MSG0018
rows.name:
Besides, this only happened because Nio took out crazy
loan for sake of Popo. So never do that again!
This ring is more than enough for Popo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041903_MSG0019
rows.name:
Okay. Nio promise to be himself and stop worrying
about material things. From now on, Nio focus only on
keeping Popo safe and happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041903_MSG0020
rows.name:
This turned into very weird adventure, but please take
this as thanks for all friend has done.[ST:wait ]
